what: trips: Trips of faecal sludge trucks — trips
title: trips: Trips of faecal sludge trucks — trips
text: dataset contains GPS locations faecal sludge trucks collecting sludge pit latrines septic tanks Kampala, Uganda. trip recorded unique identifier, numberplate truck, date time record. Data collected 30th March 2015 25th June 2015.

title: trips: Trips of faecal sludge trucks — trips
trips: Trips of faecal sludge trucks — trips
text: tibble 5653 rows 7 variables fid Running ID recorded GPS location truck. numberplate Numberplate truck, can joined trucks resource. date Date record ISO 8601 format. time Time record hours, minutes, seconds. lat Latitude record. lon Longitude record. plant Treatment plant truck delivered faecal sludge .

what: trucks: Faecal sludge emptying trucks — trucks
title: trucks: Faecal sludge emptying trucks — trucks
trucks: Faecal sludge emptying trucks — trucks
trucks: Faecal sludge emptying trucks — trucks
text: tibble 35 rows 2 variables numberplate Numberplate truck, can joined trips resource. volume Volume truck cubic meters.
